TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISmartTagExtension implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.IExtension

summary.span: 表示使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具自定义的 Word 文档中的智能标记的扩展。

span.span: Represents an extension of a smart tag in a Word document that is customized by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

summary.span: 此扩展为智能标记定义自定义识别器。

span.span: The extension defines a custom recognizer for the smart tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要控制 Word 如何识别文档中的智能标记, 请实现接口。Implement the interface if you want to control how Word recognizes smart tags in documents. ## 用法Usage 此类型仅用于 Word 2007 的项目。This type is intended to be used only in projects for Word 2007. Word 2010 中已弃用智能标记。Smart tags are deprecated in Word 2010. 若要查看示例代码，请参见本主题的 Microsoft Visual Studio 2008/.NET Framework 3.5 版。To view a code example, see the Microsoft Visual Studio 2008/.NET Framework 3.5 version of this topic.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Recognize (string text, Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagRecognizerSite site, Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagTokenList tokenList, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.SmartTagRecognizeContext context);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Recognize(string text, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagRecognizerSite site, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagTokenList tokenList, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.SmartTagRecognizeContext context) cil managed

param.name: text
param.span: 要在其中搜索识别术语的文本。

span.span: The text to search for recognized terms.

param.name: site
param.span: 工作簿或文档中的文本位置。

span.span: The location of the text in the workbook or document.

param.name: tokenList
param.span: 要在其中搜索识别术语的文本，分为一系列令牌。

span.span: The text to search for recognized terms, broken down into a list of tokens.

param.name: context
param.span: 一个提供发送到识别器的段落文本的对象，以及一种可调用以指示找到的智能标记的方法。

span.span: An object that provides the text from the paragraph that is sent to the recognizer and a method you can call to indicate that the smart tag was found.

Docs.summary: 在文档文本中搜索识别的术语。Searches text in the document for recognized terms. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由调用, 以便[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]在文本中搜索识别的字词。This method is called by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] to search text for recognized terms. 如果要合并自己的搜索算法以便除了标准识别器外运行, 请实现此方法。Implement this method if you want to incorporate your own search algorithms to run in addition to the standard recognizers. 若要查看示例代码，请参见本主题的 Microsoft Visual Studio 2008/.NET Framework 3.5 版。To view a code example, see the Microsoft Visual Studio 2008/.NET Framework 3.5 version of this topic.
